Basic attacks trigger ALL Bone Shards to strike target, each dealing 7% Total Physical Attack with 7% attack effects inheritance. Skill 1 Abyssal Bone Needle launches needle dealing damage and triggering passive. Skill 2 Phantom Shadowmeld grants 500% movement speed for 0.3s (4.5s cooldown). Ultimate Hunt of Bone shoots tether that stuns and pulls to target, tethering them for 3s (prevents displacement), grants 5 temporary shards, allows attack while moving through obstacles, and enhances Skill 2 to 1s duration with 33% cooldown.

reasoning.special_passives_analysis: Passive Bone Shard system allows basic attacks to deal damage 25 times (25 shards  7% Physical Attack = 175% bonus damage per attack when fully stacked). Ultimate tether prevents enemy displacement and allows moving through obstacles while attacking. Unique kiting and burst potential.
reasoning.final_role_justification: Bone shard marksman with tether ultimate. Best in gold lane. Scales excellently late game. Passive multiplies basic attack damage by 25 shards. Ultimate tethers enemy preventing escape while allowing obstacle-pass attacks. Extreme mobility with 500% movement speed. Top-tier late game hypercarry.

reasoning.how_stats_influenced_scores: Very high HP (2650 base, 220 growth) with excellent defenses. High attack damage (132 base, 7.71 growth). No mana with Cloudstep ascension system. High movement speed (252).
reasoning.how_skills_influenced_scores: Passive Mystic Surge dual ascension system. Thunder: Converts 30% Max HP to Physical Attack (10% ratio) - assassin style. Torrent: Converts each Physical Attack to 10 Max HP - tank style. Unlocks True Art at 5 Cloudstep stacks. Skill 1 strikes twice then lunges (Thunder Flash: 4 strikes + free movement; Overwhelm: adds 40% slow and 0.5s stun). Skill 2 leaps dealing damage and slowing (Thunder Rush: can recast on hit; Skyfall: knocks back then airborne). Ultimate ascends to Thunder (untargetable + lightning strikes) or Torrent (pulls enemies). True Arts: Heaven's Wrath (15 hits while moving) or Stormbind (5 hits with stuns).
reasoning.cooldown_impact: Short cooldowns (5s Skill 1, 8s Skill 2). Successful Skill 2 hits reduce cooldown by 2s. Ultimate has 16-24s cooldown depending on level. True Arts unlocked at 5 stacks provide devastating combos - 15 rapid hits or 5 stunning slams.
reasoning.special_passives_analysis: Passive dual ascension provides extreme adaptability. Thunder converts HP to damage (assassin), Torrent converts damage to HP (tank). At 5 stacks, True Art abilities become available - Heaven's Wrath 15-hit combo or Stormbind 5-hit stunning combo. Most versatile fighter.
reasoning.final_role_justification: Dual-ascension fighter with True Art. Best in EXP lane or jungle. Scales excellently. Can switch between Thunder (assassin: HPdamage) and Torrent (tank: damageHP) forms. True Art unlocks devastating 15-hit or 5-stun combos. Ultimate provides untargetable mobility or pull. Top-tier versatility and scaling.
